remarks:
Multiplication of complex numbers is commutative.  Axiom 8 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axmulcom .  Proofs should normally use ~ mulcom instead.  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.) 

---

 Multiplication of complex numbers is commutative.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axmulcom .  Proofs should normally use ~ mulcom instead.  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.)
statement: ax-mulcom $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( A x. B ) = ( B x. A ) ) $.
